text: Habrona is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. ==Species== *Habrona alboplagata Bethune-Baker, 1908 *Habrona brunnea Bethune-Baker, 1908 *Habrona caerulescens Warren, 1915 *Habrona concinna Warren, 1915 *Habrona marmorata Warren, 1915 *Habrona papuata (Warren, 1915) ==References== * , 1908, Novitates zoologicae 15: 179 * , 2007, Esperiana Buchreihe zur Entomologie Band 13: 1-683 Category:Thyatirinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Habrona
